heisig_chinese_memo: If people don't work as lumberjacks with trees, then they can work on computers with files.

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: If you work as a lumberjack then you hit trees to make paper to be used as files.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " wood ", " when " sound. " Stalls " are horizontal bars of wood used to divide or support objects. "Classification": "File, horizontal wooden frame file." It also refers to the shelf where the official document files are stored, and the extension refers to the official documents stored in the file. For example, Cao Xueqin's "Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 94 of the Qing Dynasty: "I also said that this item was sold out in the accountant." Xu Ke "Qing Barnyard Banknotes." Noble rank class. Military Aircraft Department": "At the beginning of each day, the cassettes were folded at the memorial office, and the emperor Bingzhu reviewed it. After the completion, the military aircraft office entered the archives."

" Stand " also indicates the rank of the goods, such as "high-end goods", "low-end goods", etc. It can also be used as a quantifier, such as "a class of people came."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " wood ", " when " sound. " Stalls " are horizontal bars of wood used to divide or support objects.
humanum_full_description:
從「木」，「當」聲。「檔」是器物上用來分格或支撐的橫木條。《類篇》：「檔，橫木框檔。」又表示存放公文案卷的橱架，引申表示存放在檔裡的公文。如清代曹雪芹《紅樓夢》第94回：「並說與賬房兒裏，把這一項錢糧檔子銷了。」徐珂《清稗類鈔．爵秩類．軍機處》：「每日寅初，在奏事處上摺匣，帝秉燭批覽，既畢，發軍機處錄入檔冊。」

　　「檔」還表示貨物的等第，如「高檔貨」、「低檔貨」等。亦可作量詞，如「來了一檔人」。
humanum_short_description: 從「木」，「當」聲。「檔」是器物上用來分格或支撐的橫木條。

從「 木 」，「 當 」聲。「 檔 」是器物上用來分格或支撐的橫木條。《類篇》：「檔，橫木框檔。」又表示存放公文案卷的橱架，引申表示存放在檔裡的公文。如清代曹雪芹《紅樓夢》第94回：「並說與賬房兒裏，把這一項錢糧檔子銷了。」徐珂《清稗類鈔．爵秩類．軍機處》：「每日寅初，在奏事處上摺匣，帝秉燭批覽，既畢，發軍機處錄入檔冊。」 「 檔 」還表示貨物的等第，如「高檔貨」、「低檔貨」等。亦可作量詞，如「來了一檔人」。
From the " wood", " when" sound. " Stalls" are horizontal bars of wood used to divide or support objects. "Classification": "File, horizontal wooden frame file." It also refers to the shelf where the official document files are stored, and the extension refers to the official documents stored in the file. For example, Cao Xueqin's "Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 94 of the Qing Dynasty: "I also said that this item was sold out in the accountant." Xu Ke "Qing Barnyard Banknotes." Noble rank class. Military Aircraft Department": "At the beginning of each day, the cassettes were folded at the memorial office, and the emperor Bingzhu reviewed it. After the completion, the military aircraft office entered the archives." " Stand" also indicates the rank of the goods, such as "high-end goods", "low-end goods", etc. It can also be used as a quantifier, such as "a class of people came."

檔字的基本解释

檔
dàng
见“档”。

檔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dàng］
［《集韻》丁浪切，去宕，端。］
“档1”的繁体字。
(1)横木的框格。
(2)指器物上起支撑固定或分隔作用的木条。
(3)带格子的架或橱，多用来存放案卷。
(4)指档案。
(5)货物的等级。
(6)方言。称水手。
(7)方言。谓时间或空间的空隙。
(8)方言。店铺。
(9)量词。犹件、桩、批。
(10)量词。指曲艺杂技等成组的表演节目。

檔字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　檔； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页556第33
【唐韻】【集韻】【類篇】?都郞切，音當。【玉篇】木牀也。【集韻】木名。　又【類篇】登浪切，當去聲。橫木框檔。　又【集韻】下浪切，音讜。義同。

檔字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
檔字的起名意思

暂无。

files
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dàng］
["Ji Yun" Ding Lang cut, go down, end. ]
Traditional Chinese characters for "File 1".
(1) The sash of the horizontal wood.
(2) Refers to the wooden strips on the utensils that play a role of supporting, fixing or separating.
(3) Shelves or cabinets with lattices are mostly used to store case files.
(4) Refers to archives.
(5) The grade of the goods.
(6) Dialects. Called sailor.
(7) Dialects. It is a gap in time or space.
(8) Dialects. Shop.
(9) Quantifiers. Still pieces, piles, batches.
(10) Quantifiers. Refers to group performances such as quyi and acrobatics.
files
